items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary has admitted any wrongdoing.
Neither Tom nor Mary has a son who's a policeman.
It looks like Tom isn't doing anything right now.
I'll probably be able to convince Tom to do that.
Tom will go to Boston with us if he has the time.
Tom will be released from prison on October 20th.
Tom went to live in a village very far from here.
Tom went to a convenience store to get some milk.
Tom went back outside to see what Mary was doing.
Tom was found lying face down in a pool of blood.
